If you want to see what [[WordPress]] looks like when it is installed, look no further, this is the right page.

== The {{DefaultTheme}} ==
The following are screenshots of the {{DefaultTheme}}, taken using a new, unmodified installation of WordPress:

<gallery>
Image:twentytendefault1.png|The main/home page (showing admin bar)
Image:twentytendefault2.png|The Category Archive page (showing admin bar)
Image:twentytendefault3.png|A static content Page (showing admin bar)
Image:twentytendefault4.png|The Monthly Archive page (showing admin bar)
Image:twentytendefault5.png|The Search Results page (showing admin bar)
Image:twentytendefault6.png|Result of Comment Submission (no admin bar)
</gallery>
